Text: Many thanks and I'll forgive your lateness this time :)
I just re read your note. Sorry about the loss of your archives, you must be well pissed off!
thanks and i'm really sorry for your loss
I am sorry that you lost all your shows and probably a lot more.
hi, do you want all of Conan's Tonight shows?

Maybe external HDD would be safer for long term storage and backup. They are so cheap now.

I have been watching Conan just a couple of years but I wish there was a way to see the older shows too. Most of the torrents are dead now. 

Thanks for these torrents!
